A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All the Star Wars cliche and Easter eggs that fans are hoping for. Enough of its own plot to stand alone for the non-fans that get drug along. Cute new characters like the porgs and a high-roller casino scene and a new whimsical layer to the Star Wars universe. A female Jedi and several important multi-racial characters makes the film feel more relatable to a wider audience the the historic nerdy white fanboy base that’s the critical base of the franchise.
